alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 3:59PM EDT until May 06 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BREATHITT COUNTY... At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Howard Creek, or near Jackson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lost Creek around 405 PM EDT. Clayhole around 410 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
